objectives: Students will discuss travel and tourism using Informal/Conversational register language
Students will engage with Romance themed scenarios related to travel and tourism
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of informal level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining travel and tourism content with Romance narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore travel and tourism through a Romance lens using Informal/Conversational language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a romantic encounter or relationship development involving travel and tourism

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice informal register vocabulary related to travel and tourism in a romance context
Students engage in romance themed role-play about travel and tourism using informal register
Students create original romance themed content about travel and tourism in informal register

discussion_questions: How would you describe travel and tourism in a Romance scenario?
What heart or passion might be involved in travel and tourism?
Can you create a Romance story about travel and tourism?
How does travel and tourism change when viewed through a Romance perspective?
What informal register expressions would you use to discuss this romance scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Romance situation involving travel and tourism
roles: Character A: Using informal register in romance context
Character B: Responding in informal register within romance theme

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Informal/Conversational throughout: Friendly, relaxed everyday speech
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Romance theme: Love, relationships, emotional connections

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Informal/Conversational register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Romance themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of informal register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
